Update documentation.Added a SplitPane to the JUnit TestRunner.

Add a checkbox to UI test runner so that user can switchbetween the standard and loading testcase class loader.[ #229753 ] assertEquals on NaN and Infinity does not work correctly[ #229287 ] Class Name too long "SimpleClassPathTestCollector"[ #229609 ] Stack Filtering missing in textui.TesRunner[ #229753 ] assertEquals on NaN and Infinity does not work correctly.[ #229870 ] Clicking on ... after tests failed gives NPE[ #229974 ] Incorrect icon shown for first element in Swing GUI[ #230581 ] swingui.TestTreeModel: results of decorated testcases...[ #230971 ] Make junit.extensions.TestDecorator.getTest() public[ #231569 ] DocBug: JUnit Test Infected: Programmers Love Writing Tests[ #232645 ] BaseTestRunner.getTest loses exception information[ #233094 ] TestSuite masks exceptions[ #410967 ] No icon provided for first test[ #230745 ] ClassPathTestCollector sometimes lists classes in duplicate
Added missing invokeLater calls for the Swing TestRunnerChanged the default test collector to the simple test collector.
